alert.note: Alert for Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 11:24AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Huerfano and west central Las Animas Counties through NOON MDT... At 1124 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Spanish Peaks, or 14 miles southeast of Indian Creek on the southeastern Spring Burn Scar, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Huerfano and west central Las Animas Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
